Contributor: Morgan, R. G., artist.; Liberty Loan Committee.;
Note: Signed "R.G. Morgan." Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Design for a newspaper and magazine advertisement for a Liberty Loan.  The text is a mother's story  about "Her Boy" who she loves and misses, but proudly supports.  Using all the money you have to buy Liberty bonds will show that support.  The illustration shows a women holding a flag with a star on it to her face.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: "Her boy!"
